definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
surname Shao/name of an ancient state that existed in what is now Shaanxi Province
to call together/to summon/to convene/temple or monastery (used in place names in Inner Mongolia)
to introduce (sb to sb)/to give a presentation/to present (sb for a job etc)/introduction
Shaoxing prefecture level city in Zhejiang
Shaoxing prefecture level city in Zhejiang
Yuan Shao (153-202), general during late Han, subsequently warlord
Shaoxing wine a.k.a. "yellow wine", traditional Chinese wine made from glutinous rice and wheat
to follow in one's father's footsteps

sentences.english: The production of PET elastomeric yarns was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 紹了子午胎簾子布用滌綸彈力緯紗的製造技術。

sentences.english: Szostak brings a lot of tools to the project.
sentences.chinese: 紹斯塔克在這個項目中引入了很多工具。

sentences.english: Szostak was born in London, grew up in Canada and is now a U. S. citizen.
sentences.chinese: 紹斯塔克出生在倫敦，在加拿大長大，現爲美國國籍。

sentences.english: Szostak's experiments show that cell walls are hardiest at near freezing temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 紹斯塔克的實驗表明細胞壁在冰點附近最牢固。

sentences.english: It depends on why the dollar is seeing strength, Shaoul argues.
sentences.chinese: 紹烏爾認爲，是否出現將取決於美元此番走強的原因。

sentences.english: Dr. Szostak was born in London, grew up in Canada and is now a U.S. citizen.
sentences.chinese: 紹斯塔克出生在倫敦，在加拿大長大，現爲美國國籍。

sentences.english: Szostak, the third winner, was born in London and grew up in Canada.
sentences.chinese: 第三位獲獎者紹斯塔克出生於倫敦，在加拿大長大。

definition: to introduce (sb to sb)/to give a presentation/to present (sb for a job etc)/introduction
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
pertaining to/concerning/with regard to/about/a matter of
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
